alert.note: Alert for Bland; Smyth; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 11:19AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Smyth, Tazewell, northwestern Bland, Greenbrier, Summers and Mercer Counties through NOON EDT... At 1119 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Richwood to 6 miles west of Raven. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bluefield... Princeton... Richlands... Tazewell... Hinton... Saltville... and Rainelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
